text: Upside is a two sided marketplace.
We're here to help communities thrive.

We've helped over 30 million customers
earn cash back,

and we also try to help businesses
earn proven profit.

We've had billions of dollars
come through our marketplace,

and that's helped customers
earn cash back.

Merchants earn proven profit, and it also
funds our sustainability initiatives.

So the way that we leverage AWS
is to be our backbone,
our foundational infrastructure.
So when our founding engineers started,

they wanted to build
this two sided marketplace,

but they wanted to focus
on the business logic.
They didn't want to focus on

all the work that goes into building
the underlying infrastructure.
So what AWS

has been able to do for us
is take a lot of the experiments

that they started off with years ago
and scale them up.

We went from dozens of transactions
a month when they started to now millions.
The key benefits for using AWS

has really been the way that we manage
our engineers.

We've been able to have a leaner
infrastructure team.
We've chosen AWS

because it continues to be the industry
standard for cloud platforms.
We've been able to scale seamlessly on it.
We've been able to keep our platform up,

and meet our SLAâ€™s across the board
for both our consumers and merchants,

and AWS just provides a variety of tools
that they continue to
improve on year after year.
